Dear God! Poor Laszlo! The finest mind of his generation, to come to such an end. 
We were heading for the Vortigaunt Camp, hoping to pick up some Bugbait so these damn things would leave us alone. But without Laszlo... what's the point?

Seriously, without Lazlo, why even continue the game, it's all doomed now! That's the real reason why we still don't have Half Life 3!!!

永恒的FPS经典！
这虽然是一款很老的游戏了，但现在来玩依然不觉过时。剧情比想象中长得多，而且可玩性也非常高，随剧情发展总会有新的惊喜，而且某些玩法也为V社的其它游戏打下了基础。
以现在的眼光来看，除了画质，别的地方无可挑剔！

忍不住了，开导
(sinx)' = cosx
(cosx)' = - sinx
(tanx)'=1/(cosx)^2=(secx)^2=1+(tanx)^2
-(cotx)'=1/(sinx)^2=(cscx)^2=1+(cotx)^2
(secx)'=tanx·secx
(cscx)'=-cotx·cscx
(arcsinx)'=1/(1-x^2)^1/2
(arccosx)'=-1/(1-x^2)^1/2
(arctanx)'=1/(1+x^2)
(arccotx)'=-1/(1+x^2)
(arcsecx)'=1/(|x|(x^2-1)^1/2)
(arccscx)'=-1/(|x|(x^2-1)^1/2)
④(sinhx)'=coshx
(coshx)'=sinhx
(tanhx)'=1/(coshx)^2=(sechx)^2
(coth)'=-1/(sinhx)^2=-(cschx)^2
(sechx)'=-tanhx·sechx
(cschx)'=-cothx·cschx
(arsinhx)'=1/(x^2+1)^1/2
(arcoshx)'=1/(x^2-1)^1/2
(artanhx)'=1/(x^2-1) (|x|<1)
(arcothx)'=1/(x^2-1) (|x|>1)
(arsechx)'=1/(x(1-x^2)^1/2)
(arcschx)'=1/(x(1+x^2)^1/2)

Good game, but ultimately I feel like its inferior to the original Half Life.
The color pallet is drab compared  to the original, and the weapon and enemy variety is smaller.
And I dont like how they made Gordan basically a Messianic figure.
It doesnt make sense for Barney to say "I think you forgot this at Black Mesa" the crow bar was a weapon out of circumstance, not some special weapon. And sometimes, it gets real boring, there are quite a few long talking segments, and while there were parts like these if the previous game, they were few, short, and far between.
But still, ultimately a good game.

8小时通关，重温半二是一个非常愉快的过程，这游戏既不像halo那样寻路难，又不像cod那么线性，可以算是神作了吧，说几个问题：1.载具驾驶又臭又长，非常不喜欢 2.敌人ai感觉没有1代强，右键像被扣掉了 3.个人感觉有一些武器设计的不太好，比如手枪，伤害低又不准，都不知道用它干啥
